context.p: Inspect the angle of the Tee fitting's 1/2 inch branch and hose barb while viewing from the end of the Tee. See . If the angle of the Tee fitting 1/2 inch branch and hose barb is lower than shown, adjustment will be necessary. To adjust the intake air Tee fitting angle follow the steps listed below.

step.cmd: Ensure the water heater is turned off at the on/off switch on the front of the water heater.
Disconnect the Blocked Intake Air switch sensing tube. See for the location.
Loosen the large hose clamp on the Fernco coupling that connects the intake air connection pipe to the Combustion blower. See .
Adjust the angle of the Tee fitting so that the 1/2 inch branch and hose barb are at the proper angle as shown in .
Retighten the large hose clamp on the Combustion Blower intake air Fernco coupling.
Reconnect the Blocked Intake Air switch sensing tube making sure the sensing tube is securely connected at both ends and is not kinked.
